hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#regular connector run cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors
### Step 1: OK un-comment in real operation #php wikidata.php jenkins generate_wikidata_taxonomy #generates wikidata-hierarchy.tar.gz
### Step 2: OK #IMPORTANT: this will be run in command-line since gnparser can't be accessed here in Jenkins #php fill_up_undefined_parents.php jenkins #generates wikidata-hierarchy-final.tar.gz
### Step 3: OK php assign_EOLid.php jenkins '{"resource_id": "wikidata-hierarchy-final"}' #generates wikidata_hierarchy.tar.gz
